chara.textHome: Rika Ayano here!
I love fashion, makeup, all that stuff!

Oh, and I like fun and exciting stuff too,
like karaoke and amusement parks!

Oh, but if me being all wild gets on
your nerves, I'll try and keep it down!

I wanna be friends with quiet people too,
ya know?
Woo!

There's only one way to celebrate
- going to Minagi Land!

Like, maybe spend the night?!
You know, go all out and
end up crashing at the park's hotel?!

Now that I know that's not everything,
I'm feeling even more driven to keep going!
I'm a feisty gal!
So I love it when these things happen!
Yeah! Let's keep this up!

My Magical Girl friends are havin' to keep
bailing me out, so I wanna get strong
enough to pay them all back someday!

Having all these cool Magical Girls as
friends makes me wanna be just like them!

Having people to look up to
is the best thing ever.

Like, it's so much easier to race for
a goal you can see, don'tcha think?!
Hey there.

Oh, wanna come shopping with 
me after you're done today?

I wanna check out the new
makeup they're selling now.
Zzz...ngh...zzz...
Mmph?
Oh... Morning...
So...sleeepy!
But, I definitely wanna eat breakfast.
So. HUNGRY!
Let's go to the caf!
I wonder what today's lunch is...
I hope it's got some meat in it!

Are you free?
Let's do some purikura!

Or we could go to karaoke!
Or get crepes?

I didn't join any clubs at school,so I always 
have free time after.

How come the late night shows
are always sooo good?

I love those short, super lame
30-minute dramas they have!

Forgetting about everything and
watching TV is the best.

When I wrote that I wanted to be
a dessert expert on my report,
my teacher laughed so hard.

I'm pretty sure I'd just get fat if I did that,
so I guess I should think of something else!
Huh? Hold on, is it time to go already?

Oh nooo! Hey, do I have time to straighten
my hair once more before we to leave?
I'll accept any challenge!

I never think about
what would happen if I lost!
Ya gotta keep up that positive thinking!
Wanna go to karaoke?

It doesn't matter if you're
a good or bad singer.

All that matters is that you put your
all into singing your favorite songs.
That's all you need for a perfect score!

Full-on makeup is great and all, but I like
to try to play up the features I already have!

I just don't wanna have someone be like,
"Who's that?!"
when I take my makeup off.
I don't like to dress too stiff.

I think you should wear stuff you can only
get away with while you're still young!
It's a waste if you don't!
All my makeup is really cheap.
I mean, I'm not made of money or anything!

I could never afford those
pricey designer products!
Plus, cheap brands are more than enough!
I really like flashy clothes,

but the kind of girls I like always
seem to be shy and quiet
for some reason.

These days you don't see girls 
dishing up the food when they go out.

Nowadays boys seem to like girls that
wait to be served and say,
"Oh my gosh, you're so nice!"
If there's someone you like,

don't you always think about what 
hairstyle you want them to have,
or what clothes they should wear?
Thinking about that stuff is the best!

I feel like Myako-senpai isn't showing
herself off as well as she could.

Like, don't you think she'd
look great in a uniform?
Yeah, she totally would!
Huh? What's up?
Do you have something to tell me?
I won't judge you, just go for it!
Yeah! I'm fired up now!
Gotcha! I won!
Did you see that? I was amazing!

Yup, yup!
Big round of applause for everyone!
I'm a loveable Magical Girl!
Wooo!
Rika Ayano at your service!

I'm way into loud and flashy stuff,
which probably puts a lot of people off...

But hey, fellow Magical Girls
gotta get along, right?
Yeah! I wanna be a real tough girl!
Let's keep this up!
So you're saying I maxed out my potential?!
Oh. My. God! That's amazing!
Nice!
I totally gotta reward myself for this.
I'm gonna go to Minagi Land with my pals!

We're gonna have a big bash
at Minagi Land to celebrate!
Oh! Maybe we should go to Minagi Sea too?
Hey, it's a celebration, why not both?!
Yes, yes, YES!!!

I promised I'd treat myself to a 
Minagi Land season pass
if I made it this far!
Awesome! I gotta go buy it!
